summary: SummaryDior Addict Lip Glow Oil is a nourishing, glossy lip oil that protects and enhances the lips, bringing out their natural color.
details: DetailsBenefitsIts non-sticky, non-greasy, rich and balmy oil texture combines the mirror shine of a lip gloss with the comfort of intense lip care. Enriched with cherry oil, its pampering formula creates protection against stress factors and drying. It nourishes the lips with an immediate and lasting effect.Research ResultsWith its Color Reviver technology, Lip Glow Oil reacts directly to the moisture level in each person's lips for custom color while ensuring continual moisturization. The lips are more beautiful, even when bare, after 5 days of application.Item 2604383How To UseWear as a primer, alone or as a top coat for dazzling shine.IngredientsUniversal Clear: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Polybutene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Parfum (Fragrance), Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Luffa Cylindrica Seed Oil, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Seed Oil, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Propyl Gallate. May Contain: CI 12085 (Red 36, Red 36 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 6, Red 7, Red 7 Lake), CI 15985 (Yellow 6, Yellow 6 Lake), CI 17200 (Red 33), CI 19140 (Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1, Blue 1 Lake), CI 45380 (Red 21, Red 21 Lake, Red 22, Red 22 Lake), CI 45410 (Red 27, Red 27 Lake, Red 28, Red 28 Lake), CI 73360 (Red 30, Red 30 Lake), CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wear as a primer, alone or as a top coat for dazzling shine.

reviews.headline: NOT WORTH THE PRICE.
reviews.comments: I've been saving my money for a while to buy this. The price is absolutely ridiculous. But I was curious like all of you. Its a nice lip oil. Theirs nothing about this oil that justifies the price. The ELF lip oil feels, smells and performs just the same. My friend is a die hard for this. I used the elf and dior two different times while her eyes were close. She chose the elf as the dior. You can buy 4 lip oils from elf for the price of one dior. You're paying for the label. If you've made it this far in my review. Thanks.

reviews.headline: Great lip oil
reviews.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I really liked the look and feel of this oil. Made my lips look shiny and did not feel too thick. It doesn't smell bad and is the perfect add on to my makeup look for the day either a special event or a daily look but looks great.

reviews.headline: Hydrated Lips
reviews.comments: This lip oil delivers plenty of hydration. The only downfall is that its a lip oil so beware it can tan your lips. It causes discoloration and thats mainly why I stopped wearing it. I plan on wearing for night outs to avoid discoloration.

reviews.headline: This is so good I love
reviews.comments: My aunt had this and then I got and it is so good it is colorful and hydrating I wish I could buy all of them. I have every color and shade these are so good. I would recommend this for everyone.

reviews.headline: Really love this product
reviews.comments: I have 4 colors, 2 or 3 more on my wishlist. Love the moisture, look and feel of these lip oils. Not very sticky compared to most glosses.

reviews.headline: Too Sticky
reviews.comments: The color was very pretty, but I couldn't stand how sticky it was, especially for the price. Ended up returning it.

reviews.headline: expensive but nice
reviews.comments: if your looking for lip gloss  and have money I recommend but if you don't want to spend a lot of money don't get it

reviews.headline: This is the holy grail of lip products
reviews.comments: I LOVE this product, it takes all the dead skin off my lips, keeps them moisturized for 2 hours (i reapply all the time cause i love the way it looks) if youre looking for a good lip oil this is THE product for you

reviews.headline: This is the holy grail of lip products
reviews.comments: I LOVE this product, it takes all the dead skin off my lips, keeps them moisturized for 2 hours (i reapply all the time cause i love the way it looks) if youre looking for a good lip oil this is THE product for you

reviews.headline: Best lip oil there is
reviews.comments: This is the best lip oil I have used so far after trying out several different brands. It keeps my lips extremely moisturized for hours without leaving a sticky or thick residue. Plus the sheer color is so pretty! I highly recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Not an oil, very sticky and thick
reviews.comments: Not sure how they get away with calling it an oil when it's clearly a glorified gloss! I am so disappointed in this one. It's not even an oil, it's more akin to MAC's Glass gloss. Not quite as think but same stickiness.

reviews.headline: Luxury
reviews.comments: Smooth, yummy smelling. Worth the splurge.  I tried ELF lip oil and it tastes and smells like melted plastic. My mother in law loves me so much she keeps necstocked on the Dior lil oil!

reviews.headline: BAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH
reviews.comments: This product is a JOKE. As you can see from the review title‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ it' too expensive and left my lips bleeding and cracking. Just kidding, don't want to soread misinformation. But the e.l.f is literally the same, maybe better. This is overhyped.

reviews.headline: Its so bad
reviews.comments: absolutely hate this lip oil. It's dried out my lips so much, I can't even believe it. It's supposed to be moisturizing, but all it's done is leave my lips feeling cracked and worse than before. For the price, this is absolutely crazy. I was expecting a smooth, hydrating product, but instead, it just sits on top of my lips and doesn't do anything to actually help. It's like it's just a thin layer that doesn't absorb, and it makes my lips feel more dehydrated. Honestly, it's a huge disappointment, and I regret buying it. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone, it's just a total letdown.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I hate that i love this lip oil because of the price. But it's totally worth it. I bought the cherry shade and i love the tint it gives

reviews.headline: THE BEST LIP OIL
reviews.comments: The best & only lip oil I have ever used. Very hydrating and lasts all throughout the day. I apply this before bed too and wake up with pillow soft lips!

reviews.headline: In love
reviews.comments: I have seen this with oil all over TikTok. I finally decided to buy it. Im in love my lips feel and look nice. I put it on as is. This is my first ever design lip oil. I love it

reviews.headline: Smooth
reviews.comments: Has a sweet peppermint type scent to it . The texture is smooth . Easy to apply . Pigmentation is subtle . Has a smooth finish to it . The packaging itself is cute held upside down to protect it more

reviews.headline: Hydrating Lip Oil
reviews.comments: I've been using Dior Addict Lip Glow for a while now, and it has quickly become a staple in my beauty routine! This lip balm is perfect for those who want a hint of color and hydration without the heaviness of traditional lipsticks. While the initial hydrating effect lasts a few hours, the tint remains visible even after the balm wears off. Reapplication is necessary after eating or drinking, but the process feels more like a treat than a chore.

media.caption: It looks orange but it's only slightly tinted and looks more clear/glossy

faceoff_positive.comments:
Indulge in the luxurious nourishment of Dior Lip Glow Oil in Cherry, a delightful lip treatment infused with the essence of ripe cherries. Crafted with a blend of cherry oil, this lip oil offers intense hydration and a glossy finish, leaving your lips feeling soft, supple, and rejuvenated.

The lightweight formula of Dior Lip Glow Oil ensures comfortable wear throughout the day, without any greasy or sticky residue. It effortlessly glides onto the lips, providing long-lasting moisture and a luscious sheen that enhances your natural beauty.

What makes Dior Lip Glow Oil truly special is its customizable tint. Upon application, the oil reacts with the pH of your lips to create a unique shade of cherry pink, tailored to complement your skin tone. Whether you desire a subtle hint of color or a more vibrant pigment, this lip oil delivers a personalized hue that suits every mood and occasion.

As you apply Dior Lip Glow Oil, you'll be enveloped in the sweet fragrance of cherries, adding to the sensorial experience. Each application becomes a moment of indulgence, as the delightful scent lingers on your lips, leaving you feeling refreshed and pampered.

Experience the ultimate lip luxury with Dior Lip Glow Oil in Cherry‚Äîa sumptuous treat that nourishes, hydrates, and beautifies your lips with every swipe.
faceoff_positive.headline: Dior Lip Glow Oil in Cherry: A Sumptuous Treat for Your Lips

faceoff_negative.comments: I recently tried the Dior Lip Oil in Rosewood, hoping it would live up to the buzz. Unfortunately, it didn't quite hit the mark for me. Marketed for its nourishing cherry oil, which promises to shield lips from drying, I found myself needing to reapply it many times throughout the day‚Äîfar from what I expected given the price point. The texture and finish were pleasant, but not uniquely superior. In fact, it reminded me a lot of another lip oil I've used, which costs half the price and performs similarly. Given the high expectations set by Dior's branding, this product felt like a letdown. For those considering this lip oil, I suggest exploring other options in the market that could offer better value for your money. There are plenty of effective lip care products out there that won't require frequent reapplication and come at a more reasonable price. Save your money and keep looking! *gifted by Christiandiorbeauty *
faceoff_negative.headline: Overhyped and underperforming üëé
